text: The qualification group 4 for the 2010 European Men's Handball Championship includes the national teams of Croatia, Finland, Greece, Hungary and Slovakia. == Standings == == Fixtures and results == \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==References== * EHF Euro Events – Men's EURO 2010 (qualification) Qualification, Group 4
title: 2010 European Men's Handball Championship qualification – Group 4
